Method Summary
 boolean canSeeOtherUsersPrivileges(java.lang.String productId)
          Returns true if the user is allowed to see other users privileges for the given product, otherwise false

java.util.List getPendingRequests()
Returns a list of requests pending the current user.

Convenience method that calls getPendingRequests(null)

Returns:
an unfiltered list of requests pending the current user.

getPendingRequests

java.util.List getPendingRequests(Filter filter)
Returns a list of requests pending the current user.

Guaranteed to be non-null, the list contains objects of type Request.

Parameters:
filter - a filter to apply to the set of pending requests
Returns:
a list of requests pending the current user.

getPendingItems
